twitch_info.title: Highlight: I wanna kill the Kamilia 3 100% TAS

message.body: It looks like a Canadian from South Park.
I'm sure it's based on that Keepo
What is this game aboot?
it doesn't have much of a plot
just a bunch of platforming and bosses
Are ya winning, Son?
I mean, probably
I am slightly concerned
I don't know if the dps matters or if the boss is on a timer
I don't even know what is happening.
I am playing through the game frame by frame
and rewinding when I make a mistake
to make a perfect run
which I will then play back when it's done
I'm rich now
You can buy all the oranges you want!
I'm more a lemon fan
@Algosith cheer-1,000,000,000
not being able to see is a bit of a problem
Oh no!  His eyes fell out!
I might have to tas this another day until someone can patch out the screen rotations so I can see
message jumpscare
hi nameless
I'm astonished I'm still alive
that's all blind
realistically I think I'
I'll wait until tomorrow to finish this
fun times ahead
we're updating the exe live
in the meantime I will practice some destruction state
Ow... my brain.
yeah, it hurts my brain too
pushed now
so after exporting gmtas I just run the "create savestate from gmtas" batch file and then replace the save?
after pulling yeah
I assume no one wants to hear the hyper speed audio
lmoa
its quite something
i also hope it doesnt break anything for playback etc
2 raiders from GaspacoZanis have joined!
hi zanis
thanks for the raid
but i did a quick glance over the other scripts in that object and it looked like it shouldnt matter
gl
and we're back
it works
thank you nameless!
<deleted instance>
now I can continue the tas
gl
I sure hope this boss is timed
it must be though
ok that should be it
lets just get one shield shot
don't want to blow people's ears out
it's surprisingly easy when you can actually see!
do you know what these triggers at the top are for? @nameless_iw
nope
in the code it looked like they actually do something though
just dont know what
i looked at it again and theres a switch statement for rooms because of course its a switch statement with like twenty cases
this is room 610
610 is not in the switch statemenet
maybe they just dont do anything in this room
does that mean they're in other rooms as well?
in this fight?
well, anywhere
I just don't know if they serve a purpose
they are in other parts of the game aswell yeah
or if we can use them somehow
probably just left over
its the same object type its just that when they get triggered they check for the current room and act upon that basically
also wondering if you could dodge the last star burst at the bottom
probably not though
just looking at it I figured it is impossible
let me show you
where do you go?
okay yeah theres no way
yeah
I need to check the tas of the fight
it's a bit baffling what's going on
not shooting the white things kinda awesome
yeah, seems like a nice touch
just like the chasing saves
vine jumping with reversed controls seems really wack
you need to press right to move off the vine
but since the controls are reversed, you start moving back into the vine right after
pretty sure they didnt intend for you to use vines in reverse controls so yeah lmoa
maybe you can manipulate the scythe to do funny things aswell
wondering if you can ptj off of the pillars lmoa
ptj?
platform triple jump
you probably can, but I don't know how
press-release press
it wouldnt be noticeable in playback so doesnt matter
why not close the instance window?
is there any other requirement?
you must have snapped up
so you need to not snap?
you want to snap otherwise you cant ptj
just like ignore it
ptj gives you 4px of height for the jump youre doing its not useful here
looks like gaming is happening
serious gaming
welcome
stage 4 soon:tm:

hype
benzen hype beat

I thought you'd need to be as close as possible to the center of the screen to save time getting pulled in
oh
isnt it timed?
maybe you have a point
I don't know if that saves time or not
I don't think it's timed, but you can try it and find out
try ig
see if it makes a difference
let me check the tas
I think adam might be right
sad
this is why streaming the tas is useful
adam just saved us a couple seconds
thank you adam
saved five seconds in shine and bright, time to save five seconds in guy
ig ptj is coming in handy now after all
how would I even know if it's optimal LUL
I guess ptj is useful here technically
you know the frame you start getting sucked in so ig you just have to see when youd be closest to it
something like that looks very promising
probably a better way to tell is the frame you get to the center of him
did you check if you gain control in benzen earlier if youre closer to it
player is pnkect7
object
I don't think benzen is connected
i just mean like, compared against being further away if that makes a difference
I don't think it does
if it doesnt then you can do more funny stuff on the left ig like what you were doing originally
well that's not quite right, what does happen earlier is the transition to benzen
the close you are to him, the shorter the sucking animation is
and that animation has to finish before he moves off screen, and then benzen happens
but does sieg go away sooner aswell? thats what im wondering
getting control in benzen would be the easiest thing to see ig
he goes away in the same amount of time no matter what
I think this is good
you have to trigger the crystal first
how?
go to the right
blue sphere is the trigger
during benzen
oh that
during benzen
let me watch a video
you want to activate the trigger and go back toward the middle platform before the red apples from the bottom come up
idk if the bursts are aimed or random btw
but can't I hit the trigger from above the black apples
oh
the problem is once you jump the spikes come up
so yeah you can probably do that but then youd be stuck at the bottom until the spikes go down again
once youre on the block you can repress j
needle...
the only part that matters is the press you dont need to hold j
just press-release j and forward 11 times
ok now
why
when youre on the block like that
right click j and release-press-release
i said release-press-release assuming youd hold it again
it doesnt matter what you do as long as theres a press in there
so press, press-release, release-press, ... all work
nice
yeah, this is what I wanted to do
climb clear
yeah i assumed as much
up to you how you wanna realize this part i just wanna see an early climb really
which I just did right?
so now I can do whatever?
ye
ye 2

that's what I was planning, if that's ok
yeah its funny lmoa
wouldve suggested it otherwise

good idea
